TEXT.TITLE: HARNISCHFEGER INDUSTRIES INC <HPH> 1ST QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 24 cts vs 1.20 dlrs Net 5.8 mln vs 20.2 mln Revs 193.5 mln vs 107.0 mln Avg shrs 16.4 mln vs 12.3 mln NOTE: 1987 net includes tax credits equal to 18 cts. 1986 net includes tax credits of 17 cts and a gain of 1.16 dlrs from a change in accounting for pensions. Periods end January 31, 1987 and 1986, respectively. Reuter
